sentences: Ameerika jalgpall on populaarne spordiala Ameerika Ühendriikides.
Inglise keelt nimetatakse ka ameerika inglise keeleks.
context: The word 'ameerika' in Estonian refers to America or American, and can be used both as a noun (referring to the continent/country) and as an adjective. From the dictionary definitions, it appears with various compounds: Ameerika jalgpall (American football), Ameerika inglise keel (American English), Ameerika mäed (American mountains). It can also refer to American wildlife like ameerika piison (American bison) and ameerika naarits (American mink), as well as plants like ameerika pirnloorber which is Estonian for avocado.
